content: basic corner to corner diagonal dishcloth with extra pointy corners i like knitting dish cloths and face cloths they are great to knit while watching tv or a movie and are a nice break from more complicated items and they really are the best dishcloths i ve run across the perfectionist in me wouldn t just let it be when i noticed that the corners made when i transitioned from increasing to decreasing were much rounder than the corners made at the cast on and cast of edges and that i couldn t get the eyelet at the top to center with simple k2tog decreases i posted my modifications to the basic pattern on ravelry and people must like it because i ve got over 100 people favoriteing it i think it s the most popular dishcloth pattern in the database materials any worsted weight kitchen cotton i ve used peaches n cream and sugar n cream for a great face cloth i use knit picks cotlin a dk weight yarn needles size 7 or 8 for the cotlin size 5 gauge gauge is not important for this project directions cast on 3 sts increase half every other row is knit plain except where noted k2 m1 i do a backwards loop k1 4 sts k2 yo k2 5 sts k2 yo k1 y0 k2 7 sts k2 yo k3 yo k2 9 sts continue increasing until you have 43 sts pointy corners turn your work to make your plain knit row k2 turn back k2 turn right k2 knit to end turn k2 turn k2 these are short row if you are unsure of how to make them please see knittinghelp com for an instructional video decrease half k1 k2tog yo k2tog knit to last 5 k2tog yo k2tog k1 continue decreasing until you have 9 sts endgame centered final eyelets k1 k2tog yo s1 k2tog psso yo k2tog k1 7 sts k1 k2tog yo s1 k2tog psso k1 5 sts k1 s1 k2tog psso k1 3 sts bind off & weave in ends this is a free pattern do not sell this pattern but distribute it freely do whatever you want with the dishcloths though
